mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hardcastle, S. Winifred to Herman J. Doepner regarding materials; 16 of 22
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--LettersItems 1-40--Scrapbook 1Hardcastle, S. Winifred to Herman J. Doepner regarding his request for citations of materials and further enclosures about the late William Herschel. List of Enclosures: -- fingerprint samples, including those of the Haggards, and of Herschel -- article "Death of Sir William Herschel, Author of Finger-Print Identity System", The Times, Thurs 10/25/1917 -- editorial "Sir William Herschel", The Times, Sat 10/27/1917 -- photo of Herschel at age 80, 1913 (6 items).; 15 pages; DF 1212
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fingerprints
Herschel, William, Sir, 17381822
